snippet.title: Puzzle Inlay Trailer
snippet.description:
Download Free: https://www.gamefools.com/pc-games/puzzle-inlay.html

A thought-provoking mosaic of delight, this puzzler will stimulate your mind and arouse your creativity. Place the colored gems into the blank space to create an interesting and attractive picture. Use a number of magic tools including the hammer, magic wand, transformer and sand glass to aid in your quest. Don't hesitate, though, because if the gems pile up you'll have to start over. Simple to play, but a challenge to master, Puzzle Inlay is perfect for the entire family.
